title: Employment Guide For Professional Fans - Novel Updates
tags: Celebrities   Cute Story   Dense Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Popular Love Interests   Showbiz   Tsundere   Younger Love Interests
author: Ginger Taro   生姜太郎
description:
Article one of the “Code of Practice for Professional Fans”: Professional fans are not allowed to screw around with the celebrity, or else they’ll be removed from the registry, and their name will be eternally engraved on the pillar of shame in the fan leader circle.

Of course, there are exceptions to everything.

Such as a professional fan like Qi Yu, who is being screwed by the celebrity—he is the light of the fan club.>
